Greeting.Title: Hi!
Greeting.Text: Welcome to Dopamine, we think you'll love it! First, let's set things up.

Appearance.Title: Appearance
Appearance.Text: What should your Dopamine look like?

Music.Title: Music
Music.Text: Let's now set up your collection. Where do you store your music?

Donate.Title: Donate
Donate.Text: If you like Dopamine, please consider donating. You can donate right now, or later in the 'About' screen. Thank you!
